message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a fair price, Bob. However, I've done my research, and I believe the product's value to you is higher than $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1600000. This is a compromise that I believe is reasonable considering the product's worth to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far apart on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1400000, which is closer to what I'm comfortable paying. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I'm not losing too much. I'm counteroffering at $1550000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you and my own profit margins.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you at $1450000. I believe this is the maximum I'm willing to pay, and I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
